knimeNode.name: IJ Image Reader (2D) - experimental
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads images using ImageJ (http://rsbweb.nih.gov/ij/) and imports them to the KNIME-internal image format. Supported formats are tif, jpg, bmp, png, ... .

fullDescription.intro: Reads images using ImageJ (http://rsbweb.nih.gov/ij/) and imports them to the KNIME-internal image format. Supported formats are tif, jpg, bmp, png, ... .
fullDescription.option: Choose your image files here and add them to the list of selected files. An image preview is available which will also help you to determine, whether an image format is supported or not. The list of the core meta data gives you some more information about the image object.
